TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASOptions root exception class. Exception class dedicated to error handling of exception in options (ZAPLINK_OPTIONS & ZAPLINK_OPT*). Have a look to each Exception text for more details. Have a look to inheriting classes. U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS U1Memories ASThis application is dedicated to the memories of : B2My father : Lamri BENSIALI (1940-2004) without whom I never started programming B2My uncle : Jacky BEDU (1934-2009) who died during the completion of this application

begin of ZAPLINK_CX_OPTIONS, msgid type symsgid value 'ZAPLINK', msgno type symsgno value '111', attr1 type scx_attrname value 'CX_NAME', attr2 type scx_attrname value '', attr3 type scx_attrname value '', attr4 type scx_attrname value '', end of ZAPLINK_CX_OPTIONS `
